attributes.title: ✨💅💕🧚𝑛𝑜🧚💕💅✨
attributes.review:
-gasp-
 i cried in horror as I opened the Donald trump app.
“Why has my phone turned into a bag of Cheetos!?” I exclaim.
In a frantic hurry to get to the bottom of this, I quickly pull out my Pratt and Whitney R-4360 Radia Engine and tap onto safari to search why on ꫀꪖ𝘳𝓽ꫝ this has happened. 
“AAH!!” I scream as a picture of an ugly orange baked hotdog appears on my screen. Then I realize... THATS NO UGLY ORANGE BAKED HOTDOG!!
THATS ✨💕🧚💅𝙙𝙖𝙙𝙙𝙮 𝙩𝙧𝙪𝙢𝙥💅🧚💕✨

The next thing I know I hear a radio blasting outside so I go outside and...

I SEE SIREN HEAD DANCING TO LADY GAGA’s PARTY IN THE USA!! 🇺🇸🇺🇸 so I went outside and danced with it

So👌I👁put👉my😺hands👋up🎃theyre😴playing🐉my🏎song🏔I 👁know✨I’m💕gonna🇰🇲be👉okay☀️Aaayyyy❤️its💅a😐party👧in💇‍♀️the🦵USA 🇺🇸
Tell me why you tryna make it to the 🥩
